body_text: Once we add an action for pref hotfixes, we should plan to send one out to update users (mostly Aurora/Nightly users) to the new URL who don't already have it as a default.
body: Once we add an action for pref hotfixes, we should plan to send one out to update users (mostly Aurora/Nightly users) to the new URL who don't already have it as a default.
